sense.def:
To hurry somewhere
pomeni hitro nekam iti.

seg.quote: He hurried off down the street.

sense.def:
To hurry to do something
pomeni začeti nekaj delati, kakor hitro je mogoče.

To hurry someone or something
pomeni truditi se, da bi nekdo nekaj hitreje opravil.

seg.quote: Efforts to hurry them only make them angry.

sense.def:
To be in a hurry
pomeni imeti potrebo, da bi nekaj hitro storili.
To do something in a hurry
pomeni nekaj hitro storiti.

seg.quote: She was always in a hurry.
Otto had to leave in a great hurry.
In the middle of all this hurry, he dropped the bag.

sense.def:
Kadar nekomu rečemo
hurry up
, mu rečemo, naj nekaj stori hitreje.

To hurry something up
pomeni poskrbeti, da se nekaj zgodi hitreje ali prej, kot bi se sicer.

seg.quote: You can hurry the process up by leaving the door open.
